entries.headline: OpenClaw lands in the garden
entries.blurb: Rolled out the red carpet for OpenClaw with a fresh landing page and docs. New seeds can now take root with ease.

entries.headline: One-click magic
entries.blurb: The setup script now auto-installs OpenClaw and handles onboarding in one go. Less config, more creating.

entries.headline: Polishing the petals
entries.blurb: Spruced up the OpenClaw branding with crisp logos and fonts. Even the mobile header is looking sharp now.
